name: PAPA LEGBA
description:
PAPA LEGBA is a fast-paced, local-multiplayer game in which players must steal a souls from their opponents with rituals and improve the Papa Legba, the magical and power structure. You know, normal stuff.

Created by Team Glitch Happens (our game jam team): 

  • Daniel Gomez (@koocachookies): Art
  • Sergio Martinez (@anidealgift): Code
  • Pedro Fuentes (@__pedrofuentes): Design

Originally created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2016. Theme: Ritual
